arguments.name: X
arguments.description: The value at which you want to evaluate the distribution.

arguments.name: Beta
arguments.description: A parameter to the distribution. If beta = 1, GAMMADIST returns the standard gamma distribution.

arguments.name: Cumulative
arguments.description: A logical value that determines the form of the function. If cumulative is TRUE, GAMMADIST returns the cumulative distribution function; if FALSE, it returns the probability density function.
